#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        sort(a.begin(),a.end());
        sort(b.begin(),b.end());
        int l1=a.length();
        int l2=b.length();
        int c=0;
        if(l1==l2)
        {

        for(int i=0;i<a.length();i++)
        {
            if(a[i]==b[i])
            {
                c++;
            }
            else break;
        }
        }
        else
            c=0;
        if(c==l1)cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        }
    return 0;
}
